summary: Frontend testing PASSED - All NEW features verified: Combo driver amps (3-Pill, 2x4, 2x6), Receive Sensitivity Loss indicator, Yagi DIR1 Position Toggle, SWR changes in Yagi mode
passed_tests: Driver Amplifier dropdown contains new combo amps: 3-Pill (1-2) (+13dB), 2x4 Combo (2→4) (+17dB), 2x6 Combo (2→6) (+18dB) - PASS
Selecting 2x4 combo amp shows correct power output: Radio 1W → Driver (+17dB) 52W - PASS
Selecting 3-Pill combo amp shows correct power output: Radio 1W → Driver (+13dB) 21W - PASS
Receive Sensitivity Loss indicator NOT visible with Center Roof (0dB loss) - PASS
Receive Sensitivity Loss indicator shows -2.1dB when Rear Mount selected - PASS
Receive Sensitivity Loss indicator disappears when Center Roof is re-selected - PASS
Yagi Array Mode toggle works - changes from unchecked to checked state - PASS
5-Element Yagi Array config section appears when Yagi mode enabled - PASS
DIR1 Position toggle appears in Yagi config section - shows 'On Truck' by default - PASS
DIR1 Position toggle changes label to 'Front Beam' when clicked - PASS
MetricsPanel shows valid values (no NaN) for all fields including with combo amps - PASS
SWR changes from 1.3 (regular mode) to 1.0 (Yagi mode) - PASS
All dropdowns (Vehicle, Antenna Position, Radio, Driver Amp, Final Amp, Antenna, Alt Count, Alt Amps, Battery Type, Battery Count) remain clickable on full trigger area - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Combo driver amps properly defined in rfEngine.js DRIVER_AMPS with correct gainDB values: 3-pill=13dB, 2x4=17dB, 2x6=18dB
Receive Sensitivity Loss indicator correctly uses conditional rendering (only shows when dBLoss > 0)
DIR1 Position toggle correctly wired to yagiDir1OnTruck state in RFContext
SWR calculation properly uses calculateYagiSWR when yagiMode is enabled
All UI components use data-testid attributes for testability
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features working correctly: 1) Combo amps (3-Pill, 2x4, 2x6) in Driver Amplifier dropdown with correct gain and power calculations, 2) Rx Sensitivity Loss indicator shows dB loss for non-center antenna positions (Rear Mount=-2.1dB, Back Right=-2.8dB), 3) Yagi Array Mode toggle enables 5-Element Yagi Array config section with DIR1 Position toggle (On Truck/Front Beam), 4) SWR properly changes from 1.3 to 1.0 when Yagi mode enabled, 5) Canvas visualization shows Yagi array with 5 antenna elements when Yagi mode ON
